review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: Item 16: Per-pane typing guard in processIdleQueue. injection.js checks lastTypedTime[paneId] < TYPING_GUARD_MS in addition to userIsTyping(). All 4 injection paths respect the guard. Edge case (undefined pane) handled by falsy short-circuit. Timer leak fix: Codex identity timeouts tracked/cleared in terminal.js. EPIPE suppression in main.js. 2 new tests verify the new code path. 91 suites / 2917 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
